item.description: 2022-07-21 ã« Google Cloud ãŒ Cloud DataFlow ã®æ–°æ©Ÿèƒ½ã¨ã—ã¦ã€DataFlow ML ã¨ã„ã†æ–°æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ç™ºè¡¨ã—ãŸã€‚1 Dataflow MLÂ - Speaking of ML transforms, Dataflow now has added out of the box support for running PyTorch and scikit-learn models directly within the pipeline. The new RunInference transform enables simplicity by allowing models to be used in production pipelines with very little code. These features are in addition to Dataflow’s existing ML capabilities such asÂ GPU supportÂ and the pre and post processing system for ML training, either directly or via frameworks such asÂ Tensorflow Extended (TFX).
